blog.name: do-it-with-the-howell-lesters
blog.title: welcome!
blog.description:
Welcome to our phanfic blog!

Ashley and Holly here! Have a look through our works on the page below!

Mobile Masterlist

summary: "You have two choices: bite me or kiss my ass"
question: "You have two choices: bite me or kiss my ass"
answer:
“You have two choices: bite me or kiss my ass”

Dan sassed his boyfriend as he leapt from the couch, celebrating another landslide win.

He couldn’t help it if he kept coming in 1st, while Phil was relegated to 12th.

Phil looked him dead in the eye, “Can’t I do both?”

That shut Dan up, his face turning red.

In fact, he was so distracted he missed the start of the next race, and Phil smirked this time.

“Too easy.”

send me some dialogue and i’ll write something

Welcome to our phanfic blog!

Ashley and Holly here! Have a look through our works on the page below!

Mobile Masterlist

summary: "Are you talking about sex or cooking?"
question: "Are you talking about sex or cooking?"
answer:
“Are you talking about sex or cooking?”

Phil jumped as PJ asked the question curiously over his shoulder. When he looked up, his friend was smirking.

Dan can called his bluff, his friend had been clearly be snooping at his and Phil texts. He winked at him.

“In this case? Both.”

send me some dialogue and i’ll write something

“Are you talking about sex or cooking?”

Phil jumped as PJ asked the question curiously over his shoulder. When he looked up, his friend was smirking.

Dan can called his bluff, his friend had been clearly be snooping at his and Phil texts. He winked at him.

“In this case? Both.”

summary: “Mistakes... may have been made...”
question: “Mistakes... may have been made...”
answer:
“Mistakes… may have been made…”

Phil laughed as Dan held up the costume to himself, laughing and shaking his head, brown curls bouncing with the force of his laughter.

“May have been? Phil this is literally a kinky anime girl costume.”

“Come on, it’s for my video nobody will know!” He laughed, but his eyes were playful.

“I mean obviously I’ll have to.” He stood and chuckled, stopping at the door on his way to change, and looking curiously over his shoulder. “Was this really a mistake?”

Phil began to set up the camera, not meeting his eyes.

“Nope.”

summary: Not gonna lie I haven't missed the drama that comes along with dinof uploads. It is bad both our and dans mental health. Dont...
question: Not gonna lie I haven't missed the drama that comes along with dinof uploads. It is bad both our and dans mental health. Dont miss that at all
answer: yeah true but maybe it’s not actually dinof the problem here. drama doesn’t happen because dinof happens. drama happens because we want dan to talk about stuff and he does but it’s never enough and we’re never satisfied with what he says and does and we get mad and he gets defensive and it all goes to shit. maybe, just maybe, we should also work a little harder to make things enjoyable both for us and for dan.
